mapper.select: select TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE(concat(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d '), b.arrivetime), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), NOW())) arrive_sec, b.direction, b.train_id, b.dest_station_id, ifnull(c.updated, 'n') updated, ifnull(c.crowdedness1, 2) crowdedness1, ifnull(c.crowdedness2, 2) crowdedness2, ifnull(c.crowdedness3, 2) crowdedness3, ifnull(c.crowdedness4, 2) crowdedness4, ifnull(c.crowdedness5, 2) crowdedness5, ifnull(c.crowdedness6, 2) crowdedness6, ifnull(c.crowdedness7, 2) crowdedness7, ifnull(c.crowdedness8, 2) crowdedness8, ifnull(c.crowdedness9, 2) crowdedness9, ifnull(c.crowdedness10, 2) crowdedness10 from (select a.* from station_timetable a where line = 2 and subline = 0 and station_id = '사당' and direction = 'ccw' and arrivetime >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') order by arrivetime asc LIMIT 2) b left outer join train c on (b.line = c.line and b.subline = c.subline and b.train_id = c.id)
